H0.text: Endocrine and nervous systems are integrated by the hypothalamus in vertebrates.

H1.text: Pathway and nervous are the two systems that the hypothalamus in vertebrates integrates.

H2.text: Marrow and nervous are the two systems integrated by the hypothalamus in vertebrates.

H3.text: Connectors and nervous are the two systems integrated by the hypothalamus in vertebrates.

A4.text: The hypothalamus links the nervous system to the endocrine system via the pituitary gland.
